document_data.caption: A map of Westgate showing Rivergate Way lined in red.
document_data.name: Rivergate Way
document_data.mainbody: '''Rivergate Way''' was a small street found in the city of [[Westgate]].
document_data.Location: Rivergate Way was located in the smaller section of Westgate found on the eastern bank of the [[River Thunn]]. It was connected to the [[River Bridge]] and provided the only means of crossing over to the major sections of Westgate other than by boat.
